BBWPC 2.4.0

Calculate the total score of five opportunity indicators for all fields in the Netherlands

Source: R/bbwp_farm_score.R
bbwp_farm_score.Rd

Estimate the potential to contribute to agronomic and environmental challenges in a region for a farm

Usage

bbwp_farm_score(
  S_BBWP_TOT,
  S_BBWP_NGW,
  S_BBWP_NSW,
  S_BBWP_PSW,
  S_BBWP_NUE,
  S_BBWP_WB,
  B_AREA
)

Arguments

S_BBWP_TOT

(numeric) the score for the integrative opportunity index (risk times impact) for each field

S_BBWP_NGW

(numeric) the scoring index for lowering N emission to ground water (risk times impact) for each field

S_BBWP_NSW

(numeric) the scoring index for lowering N emission to surface water (risk times impact) for each field

S_BBWP_PSW

(numeric) the scoring index for lowering P emission to surface water (risk times impact) for each field

S_BBWP_NUE

(numeric) the scoring index to use N and P inputs efficiently for each field

S_BBWP_WB

(numeric) the scoring index to buffer and store water and efficiently use water for plant growth for each field

B_AREA

(numeric) the area of the field (m2)
